name: Meteors Anonymous Hero
description:
The world is in danger and everything that the human being has done is about to be destroyed. An anonymous hero has always prevented that from happening.

Play a game like before, you have to prevent the meteorites from ending up with you or the great meteorite reaching the ground, if that happens everything will be lost.

You will have to show your skill and play your cards well, you can die falling into the void, staying lifeless or not fulfilling your mission but you will also have to control your ammunition. If you run out you will have to try to get more playing small games.

And the best part is that you can save the world from your mobile, going to or from work, in a quiet moment or in any waiting room. The games are short and fun and the game is totally free.

Are you ready or prepared? , here we are talking about saving the world.

PS:Sorry for my english
